SELECT V.COLOR_CODE_HEX , V.EXAM_NO , V.EXAM_NAME , V.START_DATE , V.END_DATE FROM V_EXAM_LIST V
WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') - 7 < V.START_DATE AND V.START_DATE < TRUNC(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)) + 14

SELECT V.COLOR_CODE_HEX , V.EXAM_NO , V.EXAM_NAME , V.START_DATE , V.END_DATE FROM V_EXAM_LIST V
WHERE TO_DATE(#{ startDate }, 'RRRR-MM-DD') < V.START_DATE AND V.START_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{ endDate }, 'RRRR-MM-DD')
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 1
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 2
AND V.REF_CATEGORY_NO IS NULL
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO = #{ categoryNo }
AND V.CLASS_CODE = #{ classCode }
AND V.EXAM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ examName } || '%'

SELECT COUNT(V.EXAM_NO) FROM V_EXAM_LIST V
V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 1
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 2
AND V.REF_CATEGORY_NO IS NULL
AND V.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO = #{ categoryNo }
AND V.CLASS_CODE = #{ classCode }
AND V.EXAM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ examName } || '%'

SELECT A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO , A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME , B.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO AS REF_EXAM_CATEGORY_NO , B.EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME AS REF_EXAM_CATEGORY_NAME , C.COLOR_NO , C.COLOR_NAME , C.TAG_CLASS_NAME , C.COLOR_CODE_HEX FROM TBL_EXAM_CATEGORY A LEFT JOIN TBL_EXAM_CATEGORY B ON (A.REF_CATEGORY_NO = B.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_COLOR C ON (A.COLOR_NO = C.COLOR_NO) WHERE A.EXAM_CATEGORY_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO != 3 ORDER BY A.EXAM_CATEGORY_NO
SELECT A.CLASS_CODE , A.CLASS_NAME FROM TBL_CLASS A
SELECT A.COLOR_NO , A.COLOR_NAME , A.TAG_CLASS_NAME , A.COLOR_CODE_HEX FROM TBL_COLOR A

SELECT A.EXAM_NO , B.SUBJECT_NO , GET_CLASS_PERSONNEL(#{ examNo }) AS CLASS_PERSONNEL , C.STUDENT_NO FROM TBL_EXAM A JOIN TBL_CLASS B ON (A.CLASS_CODE = B.CLASS_CODE) JOIN TBL_CLASS_INFO C ON (B.CLASS_CODE = C.CLASS_CODE) WHERE A.EXAM_NO = #{ examNo }

SELECT A.SCORE_NO , A.STUDENT_NO , B.STUDENT_NAME , C.GRADE_NAME , A.SUBJECT_NO , D.SUBJECT_NAME , A.SUBJECT_DETAIL , A.TARGET_SCORE , A.SCORE , A.SCORE_GRADE , A.CLASS_RANK , A.CLASS_PERSONNEL , A.OVERALL_RANK , A.TOTAL_PERSONNEL , A.TEACHER_COMMENT , A.SCORE_STATUS FROM TBL_EXAM_SCORE A JOIN TBL_STUDENT B ON (A.STUDENT_NO = B.STUDENT_NO) JOIN TBL_GRADE C ON (B.GRADE_CODE = C.GRADE_CODE) JOIN TBL_SUBJECT_CATEGORY D ON (A.SUBJECT_NO = D.SUBJECT_NO) WHERE A.SCORE_STATUS = 'Y' AND EXAM_NO = #{ examNo }
